summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Dibble Avenue Northwest and 9th Avenue Northwest, from West 75th Street to West 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7570 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
